lead_paragraph: In a few weeks, Christian Saffran will turn 46, which means it is not a minute too soon for him to be starting studies this week that will lead to doctorates in both neuroscience and medicine.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Detective’s New Assignment Is Investigating the Science of the Brain
headline.main: Ex-Detective’s New Assignment: Investigating the Science of the Brain

snippet: In a few weeks, Christian Saffran will turn 46, which means it is not a minute too soon for him to be starting studies this week that will lead to doctorates in both neuroscience and medicine....
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column profiles Christian Saffran, former undercover New York City police officer who is entering MD-PhD program at Weill Cornell Medical College at age 46; Saffran, whose education was delayed by unrecognized childhood learning disabilities, was inspired to continue after watching his daughter overcome similar troubles.
